definitions.definition: The side of a road vehicle nearest to the kerb : the left side if one drives on the left of the road.
The face of the Moon nearest the Earth .
A streetcar designed to discharge passengers on the near side of an intersection , rather than the far side.

main_definition: ( British ) The side of a road vehicle nearest to the kerb : the left side if one drives on the left of the road.
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) The face of the Moon nearest the Earth .
( US , historical ) A streetcar designed to discharge passengers on the near side of an intersection , rather than the far side.
